meanings.definition: Operated by the pressure of a fluid.
meanings.sent1: The hydraulic system in the car uses fluid to move parts.
meanings.sent2: The hydraulic lift at the garage helps raise heavy vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The hydraulic door seemed to magically open and close on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth and controlled as a hydraulic mechanism.
meanings.sent5: The hydraulic power of the waterfall was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A machine that uses liquid to transmit force.
meanings.sent1: The hydraulic at the construction site helped lift heavy beams effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The hydraulic on the tractor made it easier to move heavy loads.
meanings.sent3: The hydraulic in the factory was nicknamed 'Liquid Strength'.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed through the room like a hydraulic, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The hydraulic hum of the machine filled the room with power.
